DOC.brief_summary: This Phase 1 , randomize , placebo-controlled , double-blind , healthy volunteer study test safety , tolerability , plasma pharmacokinetics two different concentration TAT4 Gel administer daily 50 cm2 skin 14 day .
DOC.brief_title: Phase 1 Study Assess Safety Tolerability TAT4 Gel Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Men woman 4070 year old Healthy volunteer Provision inform consent History skin hypersensitivity Abnormality screening assessment
